title: The Midnight Library
author: Matt Haig
description: A fantastical exploration of regrets and the choices that define our lives, set in a magical library where each book offers a different version of your life.

title: Becoming
author: Michelle Obama
description: In her memoir, former First Lady Michelle Obama invites readers into her world, chronicling her journey from the South Side of Chicago to the White House.

title: Project Hail Mary
author: Andy Weir
description: A lone astronaut must save the earth from disaster in this gripping and clever science fiction tale of survival and friendship.

title: The Silent Patient
author: Alex Michaelides
description: A psychological thriller about a woman who shoots her husband and then stops speaking. A psychotherapist is determined to get her to talk.

title: Educated
author: Tara Westover
description: A memoir about a woman who grows up in a strict and abusive household in rural Idaho but eventually escapes to learn about the wider world through education.

title: The Vanishing Half
author: Brit Bennett
description: A multi-generational story of two twin sisters who choose to live in two very different worlds, exploring race, identity, and the past.

title: Where the Crawdads Sing
author: Delia Owens
description: A coming-of-age story about a young girl who raises herself in the marshes of North Carolina, entwined with a murder mystery.

title: The Four Winds
author: Kristin Hannah
description: A powerful American epic of love, family, and the resilience of the human spirit during the Great Depression.

title: The Midnight Library
author: Matt Haig
description: A novel about all the choices that go into a life well lived, exploring the different lives one could have lived.

title: The Vanishing Half
author: Brit Bennett
description: A poignant exploration of identity, family, and the secrets that shape us.

title: Where the Crawdads Sing
author: Delia Owens
description: A haunting mystery and coming-of-age story set in the desolate swamps of North Carolina.

title: Becoming
author: Michelle Obama
description: An intimate, powerful, and inspiring memoir by the former First Lady of the United States.

title: The Silent Patient
author: Alex Michaelides

title: Educated
author: Tara Westover
description: A remarkable memoir about one woman's quest for education in the face of extreme adversity and family rejection.

title: Normal People
author: Sally Rooney
description: A tender and gripping story about young love, power, and friendship.
